tool_description: Want to know whose birthdays were on a specific day? You are at right place. This API will find popular and important people whose birthdays are on the given date.
name: Whose Birthday Finder API
title: Whose Birthday Finder API

api_list.name: Get Birthdays
api_list.description: It gives the birthday details for the given date.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whose-birthday-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com/1973/03/30"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whose-birthday-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://whose-birthday-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com/{yyyy}/{mm}/{dd}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whose-birthday-finder-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
